scripts.init: npm i && cd client && npm i
scripts.build:client: cd client && npm install && npm run build && cd .. && (cp -r client/build/* public/ 2>/dev/null || xcopy /E /I /Y client\build\* public\)
scripts.build:client:linux: cd client && npm install && npm run build:legacy && cd .. && cp -r client/build/* public/
scripts.build:client:windows: cd client && npm install && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npm run build && cd .. && xcopy /E /I /Y client\build\* public\
scripts.build: npm run build:client:linux && npm run build:tsc
scripts.railway:build: npm install && npm run build:client:linux && npm run build:tsc
